Life-risking group effort saves 8-year-old boy trapped under waterfall, Central Otago https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-risking-group-effort-saves-8-year-old-boy-trapped-under-waterfall-central-otago/5CGWB2GWRJHAVGOJHHBI36CYMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-risking-group-effort-saves-8-year-old-boy-trapped-under-waterfall-central-otago/5CGWB2GWRJHAVGOJHHBI36CYMY/ Ben TomsettIt took around 20 people to save 8-year-old Mackie Blaikie's life. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:24:56 +0000 Mackay Blaikie, 8, asked rescuers to tell his mum and dad he loved them as they desperately held his head inches above rushing water after he was trapped under a waterfall. Photo / Tara Blaikie
Great white shark circles boatie off Hen and Chickens Islands, Northland for over an hour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/great-white-shark-circles-boatie-off-hen-and-chickens-islands-northland-for-over-an-hour/TKEIPF6OS5EOFGTURI6RSYAWQY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/great-white-shark-circles-boatie-off-hen-and-chickens-islands-northland-for-over-an-hour/TKEIPF6OS5EOFGTURI6RSYAWQY/ Raphael FranksA shark expert says it appears the shark had been caught in a net and injured. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:08:02 +0000 Fisherman Warwick Catchpole captured incredible footage of a great white shark circling his boat for over an hour on Sunday, describing his encounter off the Hen and Chicken Islands with the “14-foot” shark as “surreal”. Video / Warwick Catchpole

Juicy Fest: Rival bites gang member’s ear in scuffle at North Harbour Stadium hip-hop festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/juicy-fest-rival-bites-gang-members-ear-in-scuffle-at-north-harbour-stadium-hip-hop-festival/46YEWOMMMNEQZLUBH3FKXHFPGI/Police confirm man received medical treatment for 'injuries to ear'. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:14:36 +0000 A police officer was hit with a bottle and there were scenes of intoxication, disorder and assault involving people - including suspected gang members - outside the Juicy Fest music festival in Wellington.
ELE group collapse: Workers forced to sleep in cars, owner pleads for payment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ Anne Gibson'I urge you to consider the consequences of withholding payment': ELE owner to clients Sun, 07 Jan 2024 21:48:20 +0000 Up to 24 ex-ELE Group workers have been forced to sleep in their cars, unable to afford rent or power and struggling to survive here.
